meanings.definition: Relating to or involving small electronic components or circuits.
meanings.sent1: The company specializes in creating microelectronic devices for medical purposes.
meanings.sent2: The microelectronic industry is constantly evolving with new advancements.
meanings.sent3: The tiny microelectronic chips danced around the circuit board, putting on a show.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex microelectronic system, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The professor explained the intricate world of microelectronic engineering with passion.

meanings.definition: A device or technology that uses very small electronic components.
meanings.sent1: The latest microelectronic on the market is incredibly efficient.
meanings.sent2: Many modern gadgets rely on microelectronic technology to function.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous robot hid a tiny microelectronic inside its casing.
meanings.sent4: His heart beat like a delicate microelectronic device, fragile yet powerful.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the hum of microelectronic devices working in harmony.
